title: Christina Hendricks
summary: Christina Ren√©e Hendricks (born May 3, 1975) is an American actress, producer, and former model. With an extensive career on screen and stage, she has received various accolades, including six Primetime Emmy Award nominations, two Screen Actors Guild Awards, and two Critics' Choice Awards for Best Supporting Actress in a Drama Series. She is probably best known for her role in the TV drama series Mad Men. In 2010, a poll of female readers taken by Esquire magazine named her "the sexiest woman in the world".[2] She was also voted "Best Looking Woman in America".[2][3]
